snippet: The Italian designer Valentino Garavani will create costumes for three works by the New York City Ballet, to be performed for one night at its annual fall gala, the company is to announce on Monday.
abstract: Italian fashion designer Valentino Garavani will create costumes for three works by the New York City Ballet, to be performed for one night at its annual fall gala.
lead_paragraph: The Italian designer Valentino Garavani will create costumes for three works by the New York City Ballet, to be performed for one night at its annual fall gala, the company is to announce on Monday.
